author: Maureen Farrell, Lauren Hirsch, Anupreeta Das
title: For investment bankers, bonus season is a bust
description: Annual bonuses — one of the most hotly anticipated numbers on Wall Street — are expected to be down as much as 50 per cent this year, as investment banks grapple with declining revenues.
content: Bonuses have long been part of the attraction to working on Wall Street. Getting a big one is affirmation of good performance, while a smaller one could be a signal to look for a job elsewhere. One f… [+6086 chars]

author: https://www.engadget.com/about/editors/igor-bonifacic
title: Apple pulls new iOS 16.2 HomeKit architecture after users report Home app issues | Engadget
description: Apple has stopped rolling out an optional Home app upgrade after users began reporting issues with the software..
content: Apple has stopped rolling out an optional Home app upgrade after users began reporting issues with the software. "We temporarily removed the option to upgrade to the new Home architecture," the compa… [+1234 chars]

author: Allison Johnson
title: Smartphone power buttons should work like power buttons
description: Apple, Samsung, and Google phones require you to press a combination of buttons to turn off your device. It’s high time we demand what these companies have taken from us: a power button that does its job.
content:
Phone manufacturers: please give us the power button back
Phone manufacturers: please give us the power button back
 / I dont want to talk to Siri, Google, or Bixby. Please just make the power butt… [+3672 chars]
